Module codex.lb
Package codex.lb04.View.Gui

Class GuiController

java.lang.Object
codex.lb04.View.ViewController
codex.lb04.View.Gui.GuiController
public class GuiController extends ViewController
Controller class for the GUI view (mainly for the board scene)
